name: BaseRise
description: BaseRise (BRISE) is a decentralized finance (DeFi) token built on the Base blockchain designed to integrate automatic buybacks and ecosystem growth into every transaction. The project introduces a dual-mechanism model where a portion of each trade funds token buybacks while another portion contributes to a growth fund. This structure aims to create sustainable demand pressure, reduce supply over time, and provide capital for marketing and ecosystem development, all within a transparent and community-governed framework.
